# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-service-l3vpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1077/org/openo/sdno/l3vpn/l3vpnservice-deployment/1.0.0-RC0/l3vpnservice-deployment-1.0.0-RC0.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-service-l3vpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip && rm -f sdno-service-l3vpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8506
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1077 > OPENO_VERSION
